channel.title: Posts on Scotch'n'Soda Alumni
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Scotch'n'Soda Alumni

item.title: February 2018 Update
item.description: Sign up for the SnS Alumni Monthly, and follow us on social media on Twitter or Facebook. Hello alumni of Scotch’n’Soda Theatre, We have a bunch of information for you about upcoming events and initiatives. We’re going to talk about Carnival, the SnS Endowment, some new alumni group initiatives, and give you some information about alumni projects. Carnival Scotch’n’Soda’s Carnival production this year is Chicago. This dance-heavy musical theatre classic promises to be one of the biggest and most exciting student productions yet!

item.title: Alumni Projects
item.description: Sign up for the SnS Alumni Monthly, and follow us on social media on Twitter or Facebook. Pittsburgh, PA The Trouble With Dead Boyfriends, winner of 2017 Premiere Premieres! in Chicago will have a staged reading, with new songs and script, on March 4th at 8pm in the Carnegie Mellon University CUC Black Box Theater. Written by SnS alumnus Alex Petti (‘15) and Annie Pulsipher (CFA ‘17), and featuring performances by SnS alumni Marina Devaux, Andrew Abrahamson, and Alex Petti.
